lib.name: lib
lib.description: Shared utility functions, constants, and type definitions (automatically installed)

line-chart.name: line-chart
line-chart.description: Multi-series line chart with GPU-accelerated rendering. Handles 100k+ points smoothly. Use cases: Time-series trends, sensor data plotting, stock prices, temperature curves, signal analysis.

scatter-chart.name: scatter-chart
scatter-chart.description: Scatter plot with variable point sizes and colors. Use cases: Correlation analysis, cluster visualization, quality control plots, particle distribution, measurement scatter.

bar-chart.name: bar-chart
bar-chart.description: Bar chart with vertical/horizontal orientation. Supports grouped and stacked layouts. Use cases: Categorical comparisons, test results, production counts, event frequencies.

area-chart.name: area-chart
area-chart.description: Area chart with filled regions and stacked support. Use cases: Cumulative data, bandwidth usage, memory consumption, power draw over time, filled envelopes.

heatmap-chart.name: heatmap-chart
heatmap-chart.description: 2D grid heatmap with custom color scales. Use cases: Thermal imaging (FLIR cameras), correlation matrices, pressure sensor arrays, PCB thermal maps, tactile sensor grids, seat occupancy.

histogram-chart.name: histogram-chart
histogram-chart.description: Distribution visualization with automatic binning (Sturges, Scott, Freedman-Diaconis methods). Supports count, density, and frequency modes with optional normal curve overlay. Use cases: Data distribution analysis, quality control, experiment results, measurement statistics, tolerance analysis.

control-chart.name: control-chart
control-chart.description: Statistical Process Control charts with Western Electric rules detection. Displays control limits (UCL/LCL), warning limits, and zones (A/B/C). Automatic violation detection for rules 1-4. Use cases: Manufacturing quality control, process monitoring, Levey-Jennings charts (medical labs), SPC analysis, out-of-control detection.

gauge.name: gauge
gauge.description: Circular/semi-circular gauge with configurable zones and needle animation. Use cases: Speedometers, tachometers, pressure gauges, battery level, motor RPM, temperature indicators, tank levels.

radar-chart.name: radar-chart
radar-chart.description: Radar-style polar display with rotating sweep. Use cases: Air traffic control displays, weather radar visualization, sonar plots, 360Â° sensor sweeps, LIDAR scans.

status-grid.name: status-grid
status-grid.description: KPI dashboard with inline sparklines and status indicators. Use cases: Mission control dashboards, system health monitoring, fleet management, production line status, device telemetry overview.

data-grid.name: data-grid
data-grid.description: High-performance data table with virtual scrolling (10k+ rows). Use cases: Telemetry logs, test results tables, event logs, CSV data viewers, database query results, flight data records.

attitude-indicator.name: attitude-indicator
attitude-indicator.description: Artificial horizon showing pitch and roll orientation. Use cases: Aircraft displays, drone ground stations, spacecraft attitude, surgical robot orientation, gimbal stabilization, ROV navigation.

gantt.name: gantt
gantt.description: Interactive timeline visualization with infinite scroll, zoom controls, and live time tracking. Use cases: Ground station contact schedules, mission planning, flight operations, maintenance windows, spacecraft subsystem timelines.

waterfall-chart.name: waterfall-chart
waterfall-chart.description: Frequency-time analysis with FFT computation for real-time signal monitoring. WebGPU-accelerated rendering of spectrograms. Use cases: RF spectrum analysis (aerospace communications), EEG frequency bands (medical devices), audio spectrograms, vibration analysis (predictive maintenance), sonar/radar displays.

time-range-selector.name: time-range-selector
time-range-selector.description: Beautiful time range selector with preset buttons (1H, 6H, 24H, 7D, 30D) and custom range selection. Shadcn-styled for filtering time-series data. Use cases: Chart filters, data exploration, log viewers, monitoring dashboards.

drag-filter.name: drag-filter
drag-filter.description: Interactive drag-to-select component with beautiful overlay for selecting ranges on charts. Supports horizontal/vertical orientation and live value feedback. Use cases: Time range selection, zoom controls, data region selection.

multi-select-filter.name: multi-select-filter
multi-select-filter.description: Multi-select component with dropdown, pills, and chips modes. Searchable, color-coded options with badges. Shadcn-styled. Use cases: Metric selection, sensor filtering, series toggle, category filters.

date-range-picker.name: date-range-picker
date-range-picker.description: Calendar-based date range picker with interactive selection. Supports min/max constraints and timezone display. Perfect for historical data analysis. Use cases: Report generation, log analysis, trend comparison.

dashboard-grid.name: dashboard-grid
dashboard-grid.description: Responsive 12-column grid layout system with beautiful card containers. Flexible spans, gaps, and composition patterns. Use cases: Dashboard layouts, monitoring grids, analytics panels, control centers.

3d-model-viewer.name: 3d-model-viewer
3d-model-viewer.description: Interactive 3D model viewer with vertex color overlay support for stress/thermal/fatigue visualization. Supports STL, OBJ, GLTF, and GLB formats. Use cases: FEA stress analysis, thermal imaging overlays, CAD model inspection, structural health monitoring, component fatigue visualization.
